statements: SELECT * FROM mobile_applications;
SELECT app_name FROM mobile_applications;
SELECT app_name, app_last_updated FROM mobile_applications;
SELECT app_id, app_description FROM mobile_applications;
SELECT app_name, app_last_updated FROM mobile_applications ORDER BY app_last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM mobile_applications WHERE app_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY app_last_updated DESC;
SELECT app_id, app_name FROM mobile_applications WHERE app_description ILIKE '%mobile%' ORDER BY app_name ASC, app_last_updated DESC;
SELECT app_id, app_name, app_last_updated FROM mobile_applications WHERE app_last_updated >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY app_id ASC, app_last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM mobile_applications WHERE app_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY app_last_updated DESC;
SELECT app_id, app_name FROM mobile_applications WHERE app_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY app_name DESC, app_last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE notification_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(notification_id) AS notification_count FROM notifications GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE notification_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE notification_enabled = FALSE ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT users.username, notifications.message FROM users INNER JOIN notifications ON users.user_id = notifications.user_id;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM Users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, message FROM Notifications WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM Updates WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY update_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM Users WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Notifications INNER JOIN Users ON Notifications.user_id = Users.user_id;
SELECT Users.username, Updates.update_content FROM Users JOIN Updates ON Users.user_id = Updates.user_id;
SELECT * FROM real_time_data_updates;
SELECT id, user_id, data, timestamp FROM real_time_data_updates WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT message, is_read FROM notifications WHERE timestamp > '2023-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT setting_key, setting_value FROM app_settings WHERE user_id = 200 ORDER BY setting_key DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, data, timestamp FROM real_time_data_updates;
SELECT * FROM real_time_data_updates ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT notification_type, message FROM notifications WHERE is_read = FALSE;
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT setting_key, setting_value FROM app_settings WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT session_token, expiration_time FROM user_sessions;
SELECT notification_id, message, created_at FROM notifications ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM app_settings WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions ORDER BY expiration_time DESC;
SELECT notification_id, user_id, message, created_at FROM notifications WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM app_settings WHERE user_id = 5 AND setting_name LIKE '%notification%';
SELECT * FROM device_tokens WHERE user_id = 3 AND token_value IS NOT NULL;
